mapper.select: select p.userid, p.atgrade, p.username, p.userpw, p.userbirth, p.userphone, p.useraddr, p.useremail, p.usertype, p.relation, p.apptype, c.cunicode, c.classname, c.cname, c.cbirth from tb_parents p, tb_child c where p.cUnicode = c.cUnicode
mapper.insert: insert into tb_parents(userid, atgrade, cunicode, username, userpw, userbirth, userphone, useraddr, useremail, usertype, relation, apptype) values (#{userId}, #{atGrade}, #{cunicode}, #{userName}, #{userPw}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userType}, #{relation}, #{apptype})
mapper.select: select p.userid, p.atgrade, p.username, p.userpw, p.userbirth, p.userphone, p.useraddr, p.useremail, p.usertype, p.relation, p.apptype, p.cunicode, c.classname, c.cname, c.cbirth from tb_parents p, tb_child c where p.userId = #{userId} and p.cUnicode = c.cUnicode
